name: HexaCode
description:
In HexaCode you take on the role of a code cracker. You'll have to try to crack the given codes by means of simple mathematics based on hexadecimal numbers. This game can be played endlessly, since the codes regenerate for each level. So you have endless fun per level and also train your math skills.

With this game you will learn mental arithmetic while playing.

The game features include:

- Procedural level creation

- Complete hacker theme look

- In game purchases via bits

- Power Ups

- Save Game Option

- Game Statistics

- Archivements

- Over 15 challenging levels which are always self-generating so they can be played endlessly.

- Unlock all archives and turn on Time Mode to play the game in a new game mode against time.

So what are you waiting for, crack the codes and train your math skills.
